name: frontend-starter
description: A starting point for frontend projects

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sass && npm run jade && npm run webpack && npm run images
scripts.sync: browser-sync start --server dist --index index.html --files 'dist/*.css, dist/*.html, dist/*.js' --port 4000
scripts.watch-sass: node-sass --include-path scss/bourbon --output-style compressed scss/style.scss dist/style.css --w scss
scripts.dev: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-jade & npm run watch-js & npm run sync

author: Brian Scaturro
